Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Shape
      • shapes.Circle

extends Circle
    A class serving as the representation of the ball

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball(float x,
    float y,
    float xDir,
    float yDir,
    float maxVel,
    float radius,
    java.lang.String imageName)
        Constructor for Ball
        Parameters:
        x - The x value
        y - The y value
        xDir - The direction x-wise. Between 0.0 and 1.0. Used with yDir to determine the direction of the ball
        yDir - The direction y-wise. Between 0.0 and 1.0. Used with xDir to determine the direction of the ball
        maxVel - The maximum velocity
        radius - The radius
        imageName - The ball's image

                     BreakoutCanvas canvas)
        Updates the ball's position
        Parameters:
        pf_width - The playing field width
        pf_height - The playing field height
        player - The player
        bricks - The level's bricks
        brickConfigurations - The brick configurations
        canvas - The canvas where everything is rendered
        Returns:
        If the movement of the ball resulted in the ball getting lost

      • maintainBounderies

        public boolean maintainBounderies(float pf_width,
                         float pf_height)
        Checks if the ball is outside the canvas boundaries and moves it inside again if that is the case and changes the ball's direction.
        Parameters:
        pf_width - The playing field width
        pf_height - The playing field height
        Returns:
        If the ball has passed outside a boundary that should kill it

      • resolveCollision

        public int resolveCollision(Brick brick)
        Resolves a collision between the ball and a brick
        Parameters:
        brick - A brick
        Returns:
        The score gained by colliding with the brick(if a collision occurred) or 0(if no collision occurred)
